summary: CJ Mitchell is a Principal Product Manager at Amazon managing AI forecasting models for middle-mile logistics, with his team delivering $55 million in validated savings. He runs a YouTube channel called Putchuon with 65,000 subscribers focused on AI education, and is building the Context Journey, a digital continuation system to preserve his thinking patterns and values for his son London. He has an MBA from Clark Atlanta University and extensive experience across AI and product roles at major companies including Fandom, Wayfair, and Walmart.

relationships.name: Lola Mafe
relationships.context: married February 14 2023, live in separate homes two blocks apart in Atlanta
